FuncDef:
The frr command creates an OSPF FRR view and enters the OSPF FRR view.
The undo frr command exits from the OSPF FRR view and deletes the OSPF FRR view. The frr command creates an OSPF FRR view and enters the OSPF FRR view. The undo frr command exits from the OSPF FRR view and deletes the OSPF FRR view. By default, no OSPF FRR view is created.
ExtraInfo: OSPF IP FRR needs to be configured in the OSPF FRR view. To create an OSPF FRR view and enter the OSPF FRR view, run the frr command. To enable OSPF IP FRR, run the loop-free-alternate command so that a loop-free backup link can be generated.
